description: A reimagining of Mountain Hardwear's original, best-selling classic that continues to offer premium layering warmth with a unique, ultra-soft feel: The Polartec® High Loft® Pant not only has lightweight Polartec® High Loft® fleece, which gives it its iconic warmth and look, it includes strategically placed panels of stretch fleece for added freedom of movement. Layer under ski pants or over your baselayer at the lodge, they're the pants that will go with you everywhere every winter.
name: Mountain Hardwear Polartec High Loft Pants, Reg - Mens

specs.value: Polartec® High Loft® Fleece - 64% Recycled Polyester, 33% Polyester, 3% Elastane
